"Vienne": "I wish I could always look out at this beautiful snowscape..."
"If I had the time, I would've liked to go sightseeing..."
"Kvaris has so many wonderful vistas, don't you think? It's enough to make you lose track of time..."
"I've been here before on a previous mission, you see."
"I would've liked to go sightseeing again, but I'm on a rather tight schedule. The vanguard comes first, after all."
"I know! May I make a request of you? There's a few places I'd like you to visit in my stead."
"There's a nameless lake on the south side of the Danan Snowfields. I'd like you to visit it and transmit your visual data to me."
"I appreciate it. There's no rush, just whenever you're in the area."
"Don't worry about it. Your missions take priority."
